title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4214.1 - Posting order of finish
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4214.1 - Posting order of finish

State Regulations

When a result is official, that word shall be flashed on
the result commission and shall signify that the placing of the horse is final
insofar as the payoff is concerned. If any change be made in the order of
finish of a race after the result is so declared official, it shall not affect
the payoff. The posting on the result commission of the order of winning, place
and show horses or the prices to be paid shall not be deemed to signify that
such result and prices are official until the officialsignal has been shown on
the result commission or announced by the public address
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4214.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
